ModMetaData.name: VFME - Caravan Packs!
ModMetaData.author: PlayIgel, Alastair, Kayedon, SalmonToastie, Xrushha
ModMetaData.description:
Caravan Packs! is your simple solution to expanding your choice on what animals can be used in caravans! We added packs to every animal that made sense to us, from Core to over a dozen mods. Enjoy pack support for 23 animals from the base game and 50+ more from the mods below!
Adds packs to Erin's Palamutes, Anima Animals, ReGrowth - Wasteland Animals, ReGrowth - Extinct Animals, Android Tiers, Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids and Vikings, and Vanilla Animals Expanded Arid Shrubland, Australia, Boreal Forest, Cats and Dogs, Caves, Desert, Ice Sheet, Tropical Rainforest, and Tundra.
Additionally, several animals from core and the above mods have new pack textures to better match our mod.
Works best loaded after any mod that we support animals for. Will automatically ask to be there!
